Entities.Name: Assertion
Entities.Definition: The status of the bone fracture (positive, negative, uncertain, ignored).

Entities.Name: Type
Entities.Definition: Type of bone fracture described in the report.

Entities.Name: Bone
Entities.Definition: The specific bone that is fractured.

Entities.Name: Bone Part
Entities.Definition: Specific part of the bone where the fracture occurs.

Dataset.Name: Bone X-ray Radiology Reports
Dataset.Details: 13,712 reports from the UK, annotated for bone fracture status, type, and location, with a focus on ensuring no study overlaps between training, validation, and test sets.

Annotation Guidelines.Link: Not provided in the document; guidelines appear to be internal to the research group.
